MAN.TITLE: fileparts
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: returns the path, filename and extension for a file path

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a character string, the given file path
: a optional character string selector, with posible values: 'path' 'fname' or 'extension'
: a character string, the path of the directory pointed to by fullpath
: a character string, the filename part is any or ''
: a character string, the extension part is any or ''
: a character string, depending on sel value

MAN.DESCRIPTION: [path,fname,extension]=fileparts(fullpath) splits the fullpath character string in its three parts: the path of the directory pointed to, the filename part, the extension part including the dot.
MAN.AUTHOR: Serge Steer, INRIA
